articles.content: The matches between India and Pakistan have never been short of high drama, theatrics, pressure and moments. There was a time when India-Pakistan matches were frequent and billed as the No. 1 rivalry… [+2383 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Mignon du Preez announces retirement from ODIs and Tests - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Former captain will continue to play T20Is, having represented South Africa in 154 ODIs and a solitary Test
articles.content: NewsFormer captain will continue to play T20Is, having represented South Africa in 154 ODIs and a solitary Test
